Astrophysicist and Science Communicator

I am a PhD candidate in the Centre for Astrophysics and Supercomputing at Swinburne University of Technology.

I specialise in using large simulations to study the composition and evolution of the Intergalactic Medium through cosmic time. My research is part of the ARC Centre of Excellence for All-Sky Astrophysics in 3 Dimensions (ASTRO 3D).
